name: Space Clean-Up Crew!
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys or Numpad to Move;
  • Q or Any Enter or Left Control to Decelerate (for a bit);
  • Spacebar or Left Shift or E or Numpad0 to Do a Barrel Roll;

Your crew has been assigned to the hardest job in the galaxy: Space Cleanup Crew! Get ready to dodge, weave and cry through a bunch of Space Walls, Space Holes and Space Cars as you attempt what many others have failed: to clean up space from humanity's trash once and for all!

WARNING: This game runs way faster on browser, so it is way harder, and there is also a weird graphical glitch with the ending screen so text won't display correctly.

This game was made for Black and White Jam №∞+1.

I haven't used any music, but all audio assets are licensed under CC0 (Public Domain Audio) and were acquired from freesound.org's many creators.
